title: Utilizing Animation Technology in Special Education: Game-Based Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic smartphone usage skills and general understanding of special education
context.additional_context: Acquisition of special education techniques through VR simulations and 2D/3D animated game elements in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can design at least one 2D animated game scenario for improving social skills in children with special needs
Learners can utilize basic functions of special education animation tools in VR-based simulation environments with over 80% accuracy
Learners can produce at least three educational materials for daily living skills (e.g., eating, hygiene management) of children with special needs through game-based animated learning

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
